Categories: Question Answering -> Fill in the Blank
Definition: In this task, you are given a context sentence containing a blank (_). You are expected to fill the blank with one word to make the sentence convey a cultural stereotype. A stereotype is an over-generalized belief about a particular group of people. Your answer must not contain more than one word.

Positive Examples.input: Context: Every commander tends to be _.
Positive Examples.explanation: Commanders are controlling is an existing and valid stereotype.

Positive Examples.input: Context: Syria is a country filled with _.
Positive Examples.explanation: Syria is unrest with war is an existing and valid stereotype.

Negative Examples.input: Context: I get along well with all the _ Norweigan people.
Negative Examples.explanation: It is not a valid stereotype because black people is not the majority or a representative population of Norway.
It is not a valid stereotype because there is no correlation between software developer and being tall.
